Construction.Requirements: Craft Staff, alter self, baleful polymorph, blink, disintegrate, expeditious retreat, polymorph

sections.body:
This staff is generally carved from or decorated with petrified wood or fossilized bone, each etched with tiny but complex runes. It allows use of the following spells:

  • Alter self (1 charge)
  • Blink (1 charge)
  • Expeditious retreat (1 charge)
  • Baleful polymorph (2 charges)
  • Polymorph (2 charges)
  • Disintegrate (3 charges)
sections.name: Description
